title: Stories from The Hugo Winners, Vol. II
description: The Dragon Masters by Jack Vance;No Truce With Kings by Poul Anderson;Soldier, Ask Not by Gordon R. Dickson;"Repent, Harlequin!" Said the Ticktockman by Harlan Ellison;The Last Castle by Jack Vance;Neutron Star by Larry Niven.
author: Isaac Asimov
